channel.title: Natural Hour on Suntimes
channel.description: Recent content in Natural Hour on Suntimes

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Location Time Format Hours of Equal Length Hours of Unequal Length Location The location is configured from Suntimes. Time Format Natural Hour can display time using 6-hour, 12-hour, or 24-hour format. Hours of Equal Length The inner dial displays hours of equal length. Standard options include system time, local mean time, or time zones configured by Suntimes. Others options: Babylonian hours are counted from sunrise. Italic hours are counted from sunset.
